about_the_game:
The player visits a laboratory in pursuit of a missing acquaintance.

There, he finds himself trapped in a laboratory in another world.

The laboratory gives four instructions.

- If there is an abnormality, proceed to the left corridor.

- If no abnormality is found, proceed to the right corridor.

- Leave through the exit located in Room F.

- Do not turn back the way you came.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

※This work contains creepy expressions and shocking scenes. Please be careful if you are not comfortable with such content.

[Other-dimensional horror]

The setting is a special "laboratory" created by a mischievous evil god - a twisted realm separated from reality. The player follows mysterious rules and wanders around the forbidden laboratory in another dimension in search of an exit.

※The scenario is inspired by Exit 8 and the Cthulhu Mythos.

[About live videos/streaming]

Streaming and posting of videos on video sharing sites is permitted.

We are not responsible for any damages incurred by the publisher or third parties.

Streaming or posting of videos that slander others, have religious or political purposes, or are anti-social, or that violate public order and morals, is prohibited.

The player visits a laboratory in pursuit of a missing acquaintance.

There, he finds himself trapped in a laboratory in another world.

The laboratory gives four instructions.

short_description: This is a walking simulation game in which you explore a looping laboratory.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Urdu, Hindi, Bangla
